text: Nick Yates is a retired male badminton player from England. ==Badminton career== Yates represented England and won a gold medal in the team event and two silver medals in the singles and doubles, at the 1982 Commonwealth Games in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. Four years later he represented England again and won another gold medal in the team event in addition to a bronze medal in the singles, at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland. == Achievements == === IBF World Grand Prix === The World Badminton Grand Prix sanctioned by International Badminton Federation (IBF) from 1983 to 2006.
